com.ibm.disni.verbs

接口 StatefulVerbCall<T extends StatefulVerbCall<?>>

  • 类型参数:
    T - the type of the result of this SVC.
    所有已知实现类:
    NatDeregMrCall, NatGetCqCall, NatPollCqCall, NatPostRecvCall, NatPostSendCall, NatRegMrCall, NatReqNotifyCall, SVCDeregMr, SVCGetCqEvent, SVCPollCq, SVCPostRecv, SVCPostSend, SVCRegMr, SVCReqNotify

    public interface StatefulVerbCall<T extends StatefulVerbCall<?>>
    The Interface StatefulVerbCall. StatefulVerbCall represents a verb call for a given set of parameter values, a so called stateful verb call (SVC). An application uses execute() method to execute the SVC object. The execute() returns a call specific type T which can be queried for the result of the operation. One key advantage of SVCs is that they can be cached and re-executed many times. Semantically, each execution of an SVC object is identical to a jVerbs call evaluated against the current parameter state of the SVC object. Any serialization state that is necessary while executing the SVC object, however, will only have to be created when executing the object for the first time. Subsequent calls use the already established serialization state, and will therefore execute much faster. Once the SVC object no longer needed, resources can be freed using the free() API call.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      T execute()
      Execute the state of this verbs call.
      T free()
      Free any resources associated with this SVC.
      boolean isValid()
      Checks if this SVC object is still valid and can be executed.

    • 方法详细资料

      • execute

        T execute()
   throws IOException
        Execute the state of this verbs call.
        返回:
        the call-specific SVC object which can be used to query the result.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Checks if this SVC object is still valid and can be executed.
        返回:
        true, if is valid

      • free

        T free()
        Free any resources associated with this SVC.
        返回:
        the SVC object itself.
